data.comment: 4000 spectators are watching the match in Berlin.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Frankfurt have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Berlin.
In the minute 6, Hertha needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 10, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Filip Kostic.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 11, Frankfurt are pushing forward but Stefan Ilsanker's finish is wide of the goal.
Hertha have a goal kick.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
In the minute 13, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Frankfurt at Olympiastadion.
Filip Kostic (Frankfurt) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Steven Zuber.
Maximilian Mittelstadt gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hertha.
Bastian Dankert signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Hertha's half.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 19, Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
Bas Dost's header is off-target for Frankfurt.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
David Abraham is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Frankfurtâ€™s David Abraham is on his feet again at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 22, Bastian Dankert signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Hertha's area.
Can Hertha capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
Throw-in Frankfurt.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Frankfurt at Olympiastadion.
Andre Silva (Frankfurt) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Bastian Dankert awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 27, In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Frankfurt.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In the minute 30, Andre Silva nets and Frankfurt now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Dodi Lukebakio for Hertha drives towards goal at Olympiastadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bastian Dankert awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Frankfurt!
Lucas Tousart (Hertha) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Bas Dost extends Frankfurt lead to 0-2 with a header.
In the minute 36, Great play from Daichi Kamada to set up the goal.
Free kick Hertha.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Hertha.
Hertha drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
In the minute 45, Matheus Cunha (Hertha) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Berlin.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Frankfurt at Olympiastadion.
Can Hertha capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Bruno Labbadia (Hertha) is making a first substitution, with Deyovaisio Zeefuik replacing Peter Pekarik.
The home team replace Vladimir Darida with Arne Maier.
In the minute 46, Jhon Cordoba is replacing Krzysztof Piatek for the home team.
Frankfurt's Sebastian Rode has been booked in Berlin.
Frankfurt are caught offside.
In the minute 55, Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andre Silva for Frankfurt who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Andre Silva is back on his feet again.
In the minute 56, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Hertha just outside Frankfurt's area.
Almamy Toure (Frankfurt) has received a first yellow card.
Hertha attack but Dodi Lukebakio's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 58, Bastian Dankert awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Hertha have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Hertha push forward at Olympiastadion and Matheus Cunha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Frankfurt defence.
In the minute 62, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Hertha.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Bastian Dankert signals a Hertha throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Frankfurt needs to be cautious. Hertha have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Ragnar Ache is on a sub for Almamy Toure for Frankfurt.
Bruno Labbadia is making the team's fourth substitution at Olympiastadion with Marvin Plattenhardt replacing Arne Maier.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Frankfurt make their third substitution with Danny Da Costa replacing Bas Dost.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Hertha.
Free kick Hertha.
Bastian Dankert awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Hertha.
It's now 0-3 in Berlin as Sebastian Rode scores for Frankfurt.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Hertha.
Matheus Cunha for Hertha has been booked by Bastian Dankert and receives a first yellow card.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 74, Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Own goal in Berlin! Martin Hinteregger scores in his own net to make it 1-3.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In the minute 78, Dedryck Boyata (Hertha) has received a yellow card from Bastian Dankert.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 80, Free kick Frankfurt.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 81, Hertha push upfield and Dodi Lukebakio gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Frankfurt defence.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hertha in Berlin.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
The home team replace Dodi Lukebakio with Daishawn Redan.
Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, Bastian Dankert signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Hertha's area.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Daichi Kamada (Frankfurt) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Djibril Sow is replacing Sebastian Rode for Frankfurt at Olympiastadion.
Frankfurt make their fifth substitution with Aymen Barkok replacing Andre Silva.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
In the minute 88, Niklas Stark (Hertha) strikes at Olympiastadion but his header is cleared.
Frankfurt are coming forward and Aymen Barkok gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 89, Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hertha are in shooting range from this free kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hertha have a goal kick.
Hertha have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Frankfurt.
Hertha's Matheus Cunha gets in a shot on goal at Olympiastadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Olympiastadion.
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
At Olympiastadion, Stefan Ilsanker has been yellow-carded for the away team.
